DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether avanafil affect different aspect sperm production .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effects Avanafil Semen Parameters
DOC.criteria: Provide write informed consent Able produce semen sample without require therapy ( PDE5 inhibitor , overthecounter ( OTC ) medication , and/or herbal supplement ) erectile dysfunction Be medically healthy ( clinically significant screen result medical history , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , laboratory study , physical examination , etc . ) opinion investigator Be willing able comply study requirement An International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF ) erectile function domain score le 17 ; History infertility , vasectomy , testicular mass , testicular trauma , testicular abnormality ( include size ) , radiation testis , previous pelvic surgery , cryotherapy prostate , know sperm defect , retrograde ejaculation , cryptorchidism ; Resting heart rate < 45 > 90 beat per minute screening ( 3 rechecks permit ) ; Screening systolic blood pressure < 90 > 140 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure < 50 > 90 mmHg ( 3 rechecks permit ) ; High serum FSH ( > 18.0 mIU/mL ) , high serum LH ( > 18 mIU/mL ) , low serum testosterone ( < 270 ng/dL , early morning collection ) screening ; AST ALT > 2.0 x ULN evidence significant hepatic impairment ; Prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) level â‰¥4 ng/mL screening ; Individuals perform rotate shift work course study .
